      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.sender that implement ConditionalSender 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AutoRetrySender
      If a message couldn't be sent, the message may be sent again several times until it succeeds or maximum attempts are reached.
      class  ContentTranslatorSender
      Decorator sender that transforms the content of the message before really sending it.
      class  FillerSender
      Decorator sender that adds extra information to the message.
      class  MultiImplementationSender<M extends Message>
      Decorator sender that is able to handle a particular type of message.
